title: Crash in champion select, now in game and cannot open my league of legends...
body: I queued up for a ranked game, got into champion select waited for the timer to count down etc then bam, "you've been disconnect from the pvp network" I wait like 5 mins then I restart my client only to get "Calculating Differences | xxx Files Scanned" And it wont go past that. I've tried going into Rads folder and deleting the Rads files but to no avail. gg rip 1 promo game jesus christ.

replies.body: My team did not deserve that loss, lol came back in game about 30 mins in....
